Nightlight:

Nightlight tried to control her fear and while she tried to sh=
ow confidence she said "You are very kind, milord, asking for my opinion; I=
 know my husband enough to say that he will be very thankful allowing me re=
main at his side and this will double his effor to fight against your enemi=
es"

She hoped that she had told the right words.
